mapper.update: MERGE INTO DIARY TARGET USING (SELECT #{} AS DIARY_NO ,#{} AS WRITER ,#{} AS SUBJECT ,#{} AS DIARY ,SYSDATE AS REG_DT FROM DUAL ) SOURCE ON (TARGET.DIARY_NO = SOURCE.DIARY_NO) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET TARGET.WRITER = SOURCE.WRITER, TARGET.SUBJECT = SOURCE.SUBJECT, TARGET.DIARY = SOURCE.DIARY, TARGET.REG_DT = SOURCE.REG_DT WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (TARGET.DIARY_NO, TARGET.WRITER, TARGET.SUBJECT, TARGET.DIARY, TARGET.REG_DT) VALUEE (COMM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, SOURCE.WRITER, SOURCE.SUBJECT, SOURCE.DIARY, SOURCE.REG_DT)
